name: Virtual Associate
overview:
Virtual Associate is an Indian based outsourcing firm, provides a wide range of Outsourcing Services to clients across the Globe. Our team is built of well trained Computer Graduates. We have worked on a large number of Web Research and Data Entry projects catering to the needs of companies based in American, European & Australian Continent.

Our main objective is to create continual business process by managing every project successfully and on establishing long-term relationships with our customers. We value your time, money and hence strictly adhere to deadlines.

We are always reachable by Phone, Google instant messenger. We believe in timely delivery of projects and work to the best satisfaction of our clients.

QUALITY: We believe in rendering professional quality services that exceed the global standards in term of efficiency and accuracy.

CONFIDENTIALITY: Project details, Methodologies adapted, Communication details will be maintained confidentially. COST: You should expect to save between 50% and 75% of your costs when moving to offshore processing.

We quote reasonable rates for projects. The pricing is decided based on the methodology and technology used & time duration taken for a particular project. For any long-term projects, the pricing is customizable (negotiable).
